titleStmt.title: Carpenters chippes, or, Simple tokens of vnfeined good will to the Christian friends of Iames Balmford ...
titleStmt.author: Balmford, James, b. 1556.

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with added general t.p. of STC 1339: Three positions concerning the I. Authoritie of the Lords day, 2. State of the Church of Rome, 3. Execution of priests. At London : Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Richard Boyle, 1607.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
